data.name: GetAllOrders
data.value: SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedAt", o."CustomerFullName", o."CustomerPhone", SUM(op."Amount" * p."Price") OVER (PARTITION BY o."Id") as "TotalPrice", op."ProductId", p."Name" as "ProductName", op."Amount" as "ProductAmount" FROM "Orders" o LEFT JOIN "OrderProducts" op ON o."Id" = op."OrderId" LEFT JOIN "Products" p ON op."ProductId" = p."Id" ORDER BY o."Id"

data.name: GetOrderById
data.value: SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedAt", o."CustomerFullName", o."CustomerPhone", SUM(op."Amount" * p."Price") OVER (PARTITION BY o."Id") AS "TotalPrice", op."ProductId", p."Name" AS "ProductName", op."Amount" AS "ProductAmount" FROM "Orders" o LEFT JOIN "OrderProducts" op ON o."Id" = op."OrderId" LEFT JOIN "Products" p ON op."ProductId" = p."Id" WHERE o."Id" = @Id ORDER BY o."Id"

data.name: GetTotalPrice
data.value: SELECT p."Price" * @Amount as TotalPrice FROM "Products" p WHERE p."Id" = @ProductId
